title: Outriders Success, Server Struggles - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.05.21
description:
Visit http://joinhoney.com/games to get Honey for free.

Blessing and Tim talk about a huge weekend for Outriders, Xbox seemingly planning a new event, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:03:25 - Housekeeping
Right after this episode of KFGD, Andy, Mike, and Greg Miller himself will be streaming Outriders showing off Nvidia’s super cool DLSS tech starting at 11AM PT on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Over the weekend…A brand new Xcast went live on youtube.com/kindafunnygames as the team reacted to MLB The Show coming to Game Pass!
A new Invincible Reacts went up on youtube.com/kindafunny!
April’s Platinum Tier - https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids/status/1377742574417440768
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Tom Bock, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie
The Roper Report   -
00:06:50 - Outriders Review in Progress Round Up
00:20:40 - Video Games are SELLING
00:30:00 - You might be getting another Xbox event ‘in the coming weeks’ - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:39:00 -  Ad
00:42:01 - Apex Legends Season 9 might feature 'a Ton' of Titanfall Content - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:48:00 - PlayStation 5 Named Official Console Of The NBA 2K League - Official Release
00:50:40 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:53:30 - How you think the cross platform upgrades and cross-saves have been going since launch? - Michael Knight
00:58:40 - Squad Up: SSBBphenom (Xbox (but same name on PS as well))
01:00:05 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Gary Whitta

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
